about: Montana Sweets, was established in 1950 as the first sweets shop in Jeddah. It quickly became a landmark in the world of sweets, specializing in offering a unique experience that blends authentic French and Greek flavors, providing a variety of cakes and pastries that suit all tastes.

Thanks to its commitment to quality and innovation, Montana Sweets has expanded to include 10 branches in Jeddah. Each branch reflects the brand’s character, combining rich tradition with modern presentation. Montana continues to enrich Jeddah’s cultural scene with its unique creations that attract dessert lovers from everywhere.

At Montana Sweets, we believe that customer experience is the core of our success. That’s why we offer various options that cater to all tastes, including a 'Design Your Cake' service that allows customers to customize cakes and sweets — turning every occasion into a memorable event. Celebrate your special events — weddings, engagements, graduations, or holidays — with your own design, enhanced by Montana's magical touch.

Montana Sweets has also obtained certifications from the Food and Drug Authority and the global HACCP certification for food safety, reflecting our commitment to the highest standards of quality and safety. Our factory, located in the Modon Oasis in Asfan, is the heart of our production — operating under international standards and proudly 100% Saudi-made.
home: At the Montana family, we take pride in our numbers that reflect our achievements and success. We continue to strive passionately and ambitiously to achieve more excellence and growth on our journey.

Make your celebration special with your personal touch. Choose flavors and designs that reflect your unique taste and create a cake that tells your story in every detail — making your moments sweeter and more special!
